channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Book Review: My Value Creation Journey
item.description: Bartley J. Madden has produced a book that challenges business leaders and investment professionals to think outside the box systematically to solve difficult problems.

item.title: The Fed hits Evolve bank with order over fintech troubles
item.description: The U.S. central bank has issued an enforcement action against gainst Evolve Bank & Trust for failing to comply with anti-money laundering, risk management, and consumer compliance programs.

item.title: Private Markets’ Governance: A New Era
item.description: Now that the SEC Private Fund Adviser rules have been struck down, it's incumbent on the industry to demonstrate how private ordering can work.

item.title: This ‘ugly Goldilocks’ scenario could put both stocks and bonds in danger this year, investment chief warns
item.description: “The economy is a little too soft to meet equity investors’ expectations of earnings growth, and the economy's a little too strong to meet bond investors’ expectations of cuts,” Unlimited Funds' Bob Elliott told Fortune.

item.title: The Interplay Between Cap Rates and Interest Rates
item.description: What is the relationship between cap rates and interest rates? It's not as straightforward as you may think.

item.title: Workplace incivility is one the rise: 'It's about basic respect'
item.description: "It affected my self-esteem, big-time," says a woman who left her job over her poor treatment.

item.title: Still Misperceived? A Fresh Look at Bitcoin Volatility
item.description: Is Bitcoin considerably more volatile than other asset classes? It's important to approach this question analytically and with an open mind because perceptions do not always match reality.

item.title: ‘You don't have to be special.’ Tom Brady, the sixth-round draft pick turned five-time Super Bowl MVP, tells fans how he became a legend at his Patriots Hall of Fame ceremony
item.description: Brady retired from the NFL last year as arguably the greatest to ever do it, and launched a number of business ventures in his second chapter.

item.title: FX Bubbles: Through the Lens of Shiller and Sornette
item.description: The theories and models introduced by Robert Shiller and Didier Sornette are as applicable to the foreign exchange market as they are to the stock market.

item.title: The G7 will give Ukraine a $50 billion loan backed by frozen Russian assets to keep Putin’s war machine at bay
item.description: "Thanks to every American heart that supports freedom," said Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.
